commits.subject: feat: add batch file output for AI review tracking
commits.body:
- extract.js now creates batches/ folder with batch-NNN.json files (10 commits each)
- Playbook updated with batch file workflow:
  - reports/<repo>/batches/ = raw extracted batches
  - processed/<repo>/batches/ = approved batches with AI tags
  - Progress = compare file lists between folders
- Removes checkpoint.json in favor of batch file tracking
- Clear verification: can't skip or redo batches

commits.subject: docs: update playbook with human-in-the-loop review
commits.body:
- Change from 50 to 10 commits per batch
- Add review format showing subject + body for each commit
- User approves, corrects, or stops after each batch
- Multi-tag analysis based on full commit message

commits.subject: Merge pull request #18 from devmade-ai/claude/review-playbook-idea-JCZAg
commits.body: refactor: new extraction architecture with two triggers

commits.subject: docs: add checkpoint-based batch processing to playbook
commits.body:
- Process commits in batches of 50 for resilience
- checkpoint.json tracks progress per repo (last SHA, count)
- Commit after each batch so work survives interruptions
- "feed the chicken" resumes from checkpoint if incomplete

commits.subject: docs: update session notes with hatch progress
commits.body:
Processed 133 commits (chatty-chart + repo-tor).
Remaining: social-ad-creator (156) + model-pear (302).

commits.subject: chore: hatch the chicken - repo-tor processed (91 commits)
commits.body:
Second repo in full extraction. AI analyzed each commit with:
- tags[] based on playbook guidelines
- complexity (1-5) based on files changed + tags

Remaining: social-ad-creator (156), model-pear (302)

commits.subject: chore: hatch the chicken - chatty-chart processed (42 commits)
commits.body:
First repo in full extraction. AI analyzed each commit with:
- tags[] based on playbook guidelines
- complexity (1-5) based on files changed + tags

Remaining: repo-tor (91), social-ad-creator (156), model-pear (302)

commits.subject: refactor: new extraction architecture with two triggers
commits.body:
- "hatch the chicken" = full reset, AI analyzes ALL commits
- "feed the chicken" = incremental, AI analyzes only NEW commits
- processed/ folder is source of truth (persistent)
- reports/ folder removed (was ephemeral)
- Deleted scripts/tag-commits.js (AI analyzes directly)

commits.subject: docs: update session notes with two-stage extraction process
